content: this text is a legal document that outlines the progress of a legal case involving a marriage and divorce the parties involved are referred to as ms kf and mr p they got married in december 2013 and have chosen to apply belgian law for their divorce they have a son together and have been separated since may 1 2021 they have negotiated the terms of their separation agreement including the division of assets and debts they have agreed to transfer ownership of an apartment building to mr p in exchange for a payment they have also agreed on the payment of taxes and waived their rights to inheritance tax they have renounced any matrimonial benefits and gifts resulting from their marriage contract as well as any postdivorce alimony the costs of the divorce proceedings will be shared equally between them the document also covers arrangements for the childs residence and parental authority communication between the parents travel abroad with the child accommodation arrangements contribution to the childs expenses taxation and the resolution of disputes the agreements will take effect upon signing and will have legal consequences the costs and fees related to the divorce proceedings are to be shared equally between the parties the document confirms the identity of the parties and their obligation to disclose the value of the property involved they have also filed a request for collective debt settlement the document is then recorded and finalized
